channel.title: Someone help me with afk command?

item.title: Someone help me with afk command?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Why can you just use -

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("afk")) { startAnimation(1353); plrText = "I'm AFK! Brb."; }

You’re not casting it on anyone; the player uses the command himself.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone help me with afk command?

item.title: Someone help me with afk command?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

This is a useless command, do not add it.

client castOn = (client);//specific player's client

Refer to that to help fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone help me with afk command?

item.title: Someone help me with afk command?
item.dc:creator: @Pandemicpk Pandemicpk
item.description:
@Pandemicpk wrote:

this is what i got but when i use it dc’s me plz help.

if (command.startsWith(“afk”))
{
startAnimation(1353);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

client castOn = (client);//specific player’s client
castOn.plrText = “I’m AFK! Brb.”;
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Someone help me with afk command?
